Documents attached for reference - Pass once attached
Setout and alignment as per drawing (include revision in comments)
Check leakage of water does not exceed 5ml in 3 min from the valve gland or discharge nozzle assembly when the hose is charged with water and pressurized with the nozzle closed
Check if the hose can be withdrawn easily in any direction
The hose should be capable of being unwound when subject to an initial horizontal pull not exceeding 100N as per AS1221 'Reel unwind test'
Check that the low rate with the nozzle in jet mode is operational by discharging water into a container
The rate of the low should be no less than 0.33 liters/sec
Check all defects found have been corrected
Check that with the stop valve open, the hose is rewound in even layers
The nozzle re-engaged correctly in the interlock and the stop valve then closed
Check that the discharge nozzle has been opened to depressurize the hose and then closed
